rooms.description: A welcoming vestibule that leads into the central courtyard. The entrance is oriented towards the north as per Vastu for auspicious energy flow.
An open-air space at the heart of the building serving as a communal area with natural light and ventilation. Surrounded by rooms on all sides, aligning with traditional Kerala Nalukettu design.
A spacious living room facing the courtyard for social interactions and family gatherings. Vastu guidelines suggest placing this room in the southwest quadrant to promote positive energy.
Adjacent to the kitchen, designed for family meals. Vastu recommends that dining areas are positioned towards the east or south for balanced energy flow.
Functional and modern yet retaining traditional Kerala design elements with an open layout facing the courtyard. Optimally located in the southeast quadrant, aligning with Vastu principles.
A bedroom for occasional guests or family visitors. Situated on the northern side of the ground floor to maintain privacy and energy flow as per Vastu.

openings.description: Main entry point with traditional Kerala-style door framing, ensuring a welcoming entrance aligned with auspicious Vastu directions.
Secondary entrance for service and deliveries, placed according to Vastu guidelines to avoid negative energies.

rooms.description: A generously sized bedroom with an ensuite bathroom for the primary occupants. Aligned on the north-west side, following Vastu principles to ensure a calm and restful environment.
Additional bedroom for children or extended family members. Positioned in the south-east quadrant, balancing energy flow on the upper level.
A dedicated home office space designed with natural light and privacy. Placed in the north-west quadrant of the first floor to boost creativity and productivity while adhering to Vastu norms.
Integrated bathroom facility for the upper-level bedrooms ensuring convenient access.

openings.description: Small balconies attached to the bedroom windows, providing views and fresh air while maintaining privacy. Their placement is Vastu-aligned.
